@@ -681,0 +681,6 @@
+  bool is_valid_auipc_offset(int64_t x) {
+    constexpr int64_t twoG = (2 * G);
+    constexpr int64_t twoK = (2 * K);
+    return x < (twoG - twoK) && x >= (-twoG - twoK);
+  }
+
